text: Fillmore! is an American animated television series. It was created by Scott M. Gimple. It aired on ABC and, later, Toon Disney. It aired from September 14, 2002 to January 30, 2004. A parody of popular police dramas of the 1970s, Fillmore! is centered on reformed juvenile delinquent Cornelius Fillmore and his new partner, Ingrid Third, members of the Safety Patrol at X Middle School. title: Fillmore!
